title: All Soccer Abilities Are Now Mine! - Novel Updates
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Cheats   Game Elements   Genius Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Poor to Rich   Second Chance   Strong to Stronger
author: 핫식스
description:
Woo Hoyoung has returned to the past and gained the ability to steal the abilities of others!

His goal is to now become the greatest soccer player to have ever existed.>
